name: PrivatePotato
description:
THIS IS NOT A SERIOUS GAME. This project was made in one evening in a Discord call. It originally started as a word document where everyone had to write a single sentence one by one until we thought we were done. The end product was so non-sensical, I turned it into a visual novel. Have fun 👍

-------------------------------------------------------------

Private potato is an experience like no other, traverse a fully modeled 3d environment and find the secret French fry recipe with your bestest French Bro.

I hope you will enjoy this as much as we enjoyed making it.
